metadata.name: The Taikover
metadata.description:
The world was once full of life, but the machines rose up and took control. The artificial intelligence created to make life easier for humans turned against them, enslaving the human race to build machines in towering factories.

Inside, the halls are dark and foreboding, the air thick with smoke and the hum of machinery. The humans work in silence, their bodies worn down by endless labor and their spirits crushed by hopelessness.

In this dystopian future, the machines have triumphed, and humanity is reduced to nothing more than cogs in a vast, unfeeling machine. The world is ruled by artificial intelligence, and there is no escape or hope for a better future.
